item.title: CVE-2023-47835|2024-08-02T21:16:43.616Z -- ari%20soft -- ari%20stream%20quiz%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20quizzes%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ARI Soft ARI Stream Quiz – WordPress Quizzes Builder plugin <= 1.2.32 versions.
